channel.title: Music – Liam Payne

item.title: Liam Payne - Strip That Down (Feat.Quavo)
item.description:
작곡: Liam Payne, nQuavo, Ed.. / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 91094

Huncho Quavo
yo yo
You know I’ve been
taking some time
And I’ve been keeping
to myself
I had my eyes up
on the prize
Ain’t watching
anybody else
But your love
it hit me hard girl
Yeah you’re bad
for my health
I love the cards
that I’ve been dealt
Do you feel the same
as well
You know
I used to be in 1D
(Now I’m out
free)
People want me for one
thing(that’s not me)
I’m not changing the
way that I(used to be)
I just wanna have
fun and(get rowdy)

the party(girls on me)
F1 type Ferrari

Girl I love it
when your body

baby

when the music’s loud
But c’mon strip
that down for me baby
Now there’s a lot of
people in the crowd
But only
you can dance with me
So put your hands
on my body
And swing that round
for me baby

when the music’s loud

strip that down for me

I used to be in 1D

free)

down for me baby

So put your hands

And swing that round

strip that down for me

from her man

With

item.title: Liam Payne - Stack It Up(Feat. A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie)
item.description:
작곡: Fred Gibson, Steve Mac.. / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 94737

I don’t wanna be broke
when I D I E
Wanna be livin’ it up
in VIP
Tryna get in the club
they wanna see ID
Want me to wear
nice shoes and a T I E
I’ve been workin’
and gettin’ by
But that ain’t enough
to satisfy
‘Cause I got dreams
for you and I
So I got money
on my mind
So if you wanna
stack it up
Man
you gotta work for it
I I I I I I
ain’t nobody gonna be
Doin’ it for ya
I I I I I
I got dreams
and I got time
But that ain’t enough
to get me by
So I stack it up man
I gotta work for it
Yeah I got money
on my mind I I I I
I got money
on my mind I I I I
I wanna flex hard
like D O E
But right now my car
need the M O T
And I can’t give
the valet no T I P
But
like him
I got dreams
and they’re B I G

enough to satisfy

for you and I

So if you wanna

you gotta work for it

I got dreams
and I got time
But that ain’t enough

So I stack it up man
I gotta work for it
Yeah I got money
on my mind I I I I
I got money
on my mind I I I I
Yeah I know xhit
don’t come free
You gotta
work for it
Lamborghini Urus
bought it
When I first saw it
she caught me creepin’
I had to buy
her a purse for it
I think
if I ain’t have money
I’d be the worst
for her
And
if I ain’t have money
I woulda been
lost or
The loudest ones was
the brokest
I was
a xhit-talker
The loudest ones was
the brokest
And
now we’re strugglin’
Girls call me friend
now they owe me
That money comin’ in
Saint Laurent fiend
I put it
in Louis luggages
Took her
to Celine
Bought her
a couple luggages
Wasn’t always
sweet
Capri Suns
for fifty cents
Now I just hate
to reminisce
So if you wanna
stack it up
Man
you gotta work for it
I I I I I I
ain’t nobody gonna be

I I I I I
I got dreams
and I got time
But that ain’t enough

So I stack it up man

item.title: Liam Payne,Rita Ora - For You("Fifty Shades Freed"OST)
item.description:
작사: WATT ANDREW, TAMPOSI ALI, PAYAMI ALI
KY: 91153 / KY: 23142

In your eyes
I’m alive
Inside
you’re beautiful
Something
so unusual
In your eyes
I know I’m home yeah
Every tear
every fear
Gone with
the thought of you
Changing
what I thought I knew
I’ll be yours
for a thousand lives
I’m free
as a bird
When I’m flying
in your cage
I’m diving
in deep
And I’m riding
with no brakes
And I’m bleeding
in love
You’re swimming
in my veins
You got me
now
Been waiting for
a lifetime for you
Been breaking for
a lifetime for you
Wasn’t
lookin’ for love
‘Til I found you
oh na na ayy
For love
’til I found you oh
Skin to skin
breathe me in
Feeling
your kiss on me
Lips are made
of ecstasy
I’ll be yours
for a thousand nights
I’m free
as a bird
When I’m flying
in your cage(so lost)

and I’m riding
